DOC.brief_summary: This study seeks to evaluate a novel endpoint for future dry AMD clinical trials.
DOC.brief_title: A Single-Center Pilot Study to Assess Macular Function
DOC.criteria: Subjects in good health aged 2029 or 6090 years (normal cohorts) Subjects with early nonexudative agerelated macular degeneration (AMD cohort) Enrollment in a investigational drug or device study and have used an investigational drug or device within 7 days of enrollment into this study
